verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Aulaye mwili wangu
na kuinywa damu yangu,
(asema Bwana),
hukaa ndani yangu,
nami hukaa ndani yake. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Aulaye mwili wangu,
na kuinywa damu yangu,
ana uzima wa milele.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Njoni enyi wenye njaa,
njooni enyi wenye kiu,
njoni kwangu niwashibishe.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Aniaminiye mimi,
na kushika nisemavyo,
nitamfufua siku ya mwisho.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mlapo chakula hiki,
mnywapo kinywaji hiki,
mwatangaza kifo cha Bwana.
